00001 /**
00002     @mainpage  Nitrox Driver API 
00003 
00004 
00005 The NITROX Macroprocessor provides hardware-based acceleration of cryptographic
00006 algorithms and protocol processing. To realize the benefits of this acceleration
00007 requires the integration of the NITROX processor into existing hardware, and the
00008 integration of the NITROX API calls into the respective software applications 
00009 and system software. The NITROX Macroprocessor can be integrated in multiple 
00010 hardware platforms and multiple operating systems.
00011 
00012 The NITROX API and device driver software have been designed to achieve the 
00013 following objectives:
00014      <ul>
00015      <li> High system performance</li>
00016      <li> Operating System independence</li>
00017      <li> Hardware layer abstraction</li>
00018      <li> Error Handling</li>
00019      <li> Set of high-level APIs to allow ease of integration and software management.</li>
00020      </ul>
00021
